metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25729 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: ZoneMinder before 1.34.21 has XSS via the connkey parameter to download.php or export.php.

notes.Note: ccdm94> this vulnerability seems to have been introduced with commits 24a5b78f4c and 05f0338219. These commits are not present in xenial's, nor in focal's zoneminder packages.

criterions.comment: zoneminder: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
